_v.en: When the sky is rent apart,
then a soul shall know what it has sent ahead and left behind.

_v.ar: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
_v.en: O man! What has deceived you about your generous Lord,
who created you and proportioned you, and gave you an upright nature,

_v.ar: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
_v.en: and composed you in any form that He wished?
No! Indeed, you deny the Retribution.
Indeed, there are over you watchers,
Indeed the pious shall be amid bliss,
and indeed the vicious shall be in hell,
entering it on the Day of Retribution,
and they shall not be absent from it.
And what will show you what is the Day of Retribution?

_v.ar: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
_v.en: Again, what will show you what is the Day of Retribution?

_v.ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
_v.en: It is a day when no soul will be of any avail to another soul and all command that day will belong to Allah.
